name: ColorCrate
description:
Inspired by the puzzles in 'The Witness' I tried to inverse the idea where instead of following the rules in the puzzle you add them in yourself. 

Tried to make puzzles where the player could learn what each colors rule is.

Very short game, but something I thought i would share.

Link to source code:
https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=0feb9f6a5f979bdf1d893f58c86d9df4

The game can now be played at this url:
https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=0feb9f6a5f979bdf1d893f58c86d9df4
